scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.debug: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore --inspect-functions --export-on-exit=./backup/data/emulator --import=./backup/data/emulator
scripts.alex: npm run build && cross-env TRIGGER_COLLECTION=alex YOUTUBE_API_KEY=alex firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore --inspect-functions --export-on-exit=./backup/data/emulator --import=./backup/data/emulator
